title: What are on home screens?
answer:
Your phone has three default home screens. You can swipe left or right to switch the home screens, and set the effect of switching home screens. You can create shortcuts for applications and widgets on the home screen, and touch the corresponding icon to open the application or widget. 

 The following screenshots show the home screens and their components: 

 1. Signal bar 

 1. Widgets 

 1. Shortcuts 

 1. Dock area: holds application shortcuts that do not move with screen switching. 

 Home screen elements include application shortcuts and widgets. To create a folder, drag an application shortcut onto another shortcut. A folder containing both applications is then created.
